What makes a great company? Great people ( among other things.)

Three new people joined Sonic Notify over the last few weeks and here they are in no particular order.

Carlo -

Operations! QA! Carlo is a man with many hats. 

Torrey - 

Administration with a heart set on some marketing and sales. Today was his birthday. So of course he got a cake. We love cakes. 

Mikhail - 

Developer and now getting to be a close friend of Selenium . Mmm Selenium Good, not as good as cake though.
